ai-patthana16.42:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_0: This is the cause, not the reason for the sake of listening to the teaching.
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_1: This is the cause, not the reason why, for the sake of the people that causes a reason why.
ai-patthana16.42:1.1_2: This is the cause, not the reason for the sake of the present, nor for the sake of listening to the teaching.
